description.value:
You encourage yourself or an ally, psyching them up for a coming challenge and granting them temporary Hit Points. Select yourself or an ally within 30 feet, then attempt a @Check[type:diplomacy|dc:20] check. If you have master proficiency in Diplomacy, you can instead attempt a @Check[type:diplomacy|dc:30] check to increase the temporary Hit Points gained on a successful check by 5. If you have legendary proficiency, you can instead attempt a @Check[type:diplomacy|dc:40] check to increase the temporary Hit Points gained on a successful check by 10. These temporary Hit Points last for one minute. The target is then temporarily immune to your Hang in There! for 1 day.

@UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.conditions.Item.lfG1m2ww3mdZY5jA]{Effect: Hang In There!}

Critical Success The target gains temporary Hit Points equal to double their level.

Success The target gains temporary Hit Points equal to their level.

Failure The target is unaffected, and you can't use Hang in There! again for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The target is unaffected, and you can't use Hang in There! again for 1 hour.
